hero.title: Global Logistics Solutions for Modern Business
hero.subtitle: BRL Global delivers seamless freight forwarding and logistics services across sea, air, and land. We connect businesses worldwide with reliable, efficient shipping solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to your business needs

oceanFreight.title: Ocean Freight
oceanFreight.description: Reliable ocean freight solutions for your global shipping needs. FCL and LCL services available.

airFreight.title: Air Freight
airFreight.description: Fast and efficient air freight services for time-sensitive cargo worldwide.

groundTransport.title: Ground Transport
groundTransport.description: Comprehensive ground transportation solutions for domestic and cross-border shipping.

about.title: About BRL Global
about.subtitle: A leading provider of global logistics solutions, committed to excellence and innovation in freight forwarding services.

story.title: Our Story
story.part1: Founded in 2008, BRL Global has grown from a small regional freight forwarder to a leading international logistics provider. Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, strategic expansion, and an unwavering commitment to customer service.
story.part2: Today, we operate across multiple continents, serving diverse industries with comprehensive logistics solutions. Our success is built on our dedicated team, advanced technology, and strong partnerships with carriers and agents worldwide.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, maintaining the highest standards of quality and professionalism.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We build lasting relationships through dedicated service and support.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: With a worldwide network of partners and offices, we provide seamless logistics solutions across continents.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously invest in technology and processes to improve our services and stay ahead of industry trends.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for any inquiries or support

success.title: Message Sent
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you shortly.

error.title: Error
error.message: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

footer.description: Your trusted partner in global freight forwarding and logistics solutions.
